title: Create FO-04 info page
description:
Create the info page for FO-04 that explains the implementation.

File to create: app/fo-04/info/page.tsx

Include:
- Description of FO-04's dynamic discovery approach
- How it differs from FO-03 (AI-generated screens vs hardcoded)
- Key features: chip-in-input UX, reflective statements, 2-5 adaptive screens
- Link to the spec document

Follow the pattern from app/fo-03/info/page.tsx.
acceptance_criteria: Navigating to /fo-04/info shows the info page with FO-04 description
closed_reason: Created FO-04 info page with description of dynamic discovery approach and key features
